org.aludratest.config
Class ComponentConfigurator

java.lang.Object
  org.aludratest.config.ComponentConfigurator

public class ComponentConfigurator
extends Object

Helper class and entry point to AludraTest Configuration Service.

Author:
falbrech

Method Summary
static void configure(Configurable configurable)
          Deprecated. Please prefer one of these methods to configure your objects:
  1. Retrieve your objects via AludraServiceManager, AludraTestContext or AludraServiceContext, and their methods to instantiate new objects. These will automatically configure the objects.
  2. If you require to directly configure an object, retrieve an Configurator instance from one of the mentioned classes, and use it to configure your object.
static void configure(String instanceName, Configurable configurable)
          Deprecated. Please prefer one of these methods to configure your objects:
  1. Retrieve your objects via AludraServiceManager, AludraTestContext or AludraServiceContext, and their methods to instantiate new objects. These will automatically configure the objects.
  2. If you require to directly configure an object, retrieve an Configurator instance from one of the mentioned classes, and use it to configure your object.

Method Detail

configure

@Deprecated
public static void configure(Configurable configurable)
Deprecated. Please prefer one of these methods to configure your objects:
  1. Retrieve your objects via AludraServiceManager, AludraTestContext or AludraServiceContext, and their methods to instantiate new objects. These will automatically configure the objects.
  2. If you require to directly configure an object, retrieve an Configurator instance from one of the mentioned classes, and use it to configure your object.

Configures the given configurable object.

Parameters:
configurable - Object to configure.

configure

@Deprecated
public static void configure(String instanceName,
                                        Configurable configurable)
Deprecated. Please prefer one of these methods to configure your objects:
  1. Retrieve your objects via AludraServiceManager, AludraTestContext or AludraServiceContext, and their methods to instantiate new objects. These will automatically configure the objects.
  2. If you require to directly configure an object, retrieve an Configurator instance from one of the mentioned classes, and use it to configure your object.

Configures the given configurable object, instantiated for the given instance name.

Parameters:
instanceName - Name of the instance, which is used for configuration lookup.
configurable - Object to configure.

fillPreferencesFromPropertiesResource

public static void fillPreferencesFromPropertiesResource(MutablePreferences preferences,
                                                         String resourceName,
                                                         ClassLoader classLoader)
                                                  throws IOException
Fills the given Preferences object with the Properties loaded from a given resource name. This is useful to implement Configurable.fillDefaults(MutablePreferences).

Parameters:
preferences - Preferences object to fill.
resourceName - Resource name to load as a Properties file.
classLoader - ClassLoader to use to look for the resource.
Throws:
IOException - If the resource could not be loaded.
